channel.title: Mist - Ethereum integration Whonix 14
channel.description:
Dear Whonix Team,
I love you guys, keep up the good work! Whonix has been my number one favorite anonymous os and i really feel strong having all these tools at my disposal! You're are great! I' ve tested the ethereum mist app in the new whonix 14. But it doesn't seem to work yet, i couldn't find the command to start mist and try out the app. By any chances progress on this?
Also the code is a bit altered https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Ethereum But it installed succesfully i only need to know how to start the app so i can test it and give feedback.
Thanks in advance!

A post was split to a new topic: Support policy for gazillion of crypto currencies?

Read full topic

item.title: Mist - Ethereum integration Whonix 14
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
whonixisbest:

i couldn’t find the command to start mist and try out the app.

Could you please try to figure out how to do that on Debian as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle?

Read full topic

item.title: Mist - Ethereum integration Whonix 14
item.dc:creator: whonixisbest
item.description:
Dear Whonix Team,

I love you guys, keep up the good work! Whonix has been my number one favorite anonymous os and i really feel strong having all these tools at my disposal! You’re are great!
I’ ve tested the ethereum mist app in the new whonix 14. But it doesn’t seem to work yet, i couldn’t find the command to start mist and try out the app. By any chances progress on this?

Also the code is a bit altered https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Ethereum
But it installed succesfully i only need to know how to start the app so i can test it and give feedback.

Thanks in advance!

Read full topic
